{"id":918776733,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"6 months, 1 week","timestamp":1679318705,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"11 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/918776733/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"8.2 MB","code":"#include <iostream>\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string s) {\n        int start=0,max_length=0;\n        unordered_map<char, int> char_map;\n\n        for(int i=0;i<s.size();i++){\n            if (char_map.count(s[i]) && char_map[s[i]] >= start) {\n                max_length = max(max_length, i - start);\n                start = char_map[s[i]] + 1;\n            }\n            char_map[s[i]] = i;\n        }\n        return max(max_length,(int)s.size()-start);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
